contentrichtext.text: *Orphan self-referential article. Not enencyclopedic. -- [[User:Seth Ilys|Seth Ilys]] 21:41, 6 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Delete, pointless. [[User:Angela|Angela]][[user talk:Angela|.]] 22:41, Apr 6, 2004 (UTC) * Delete, and [[Self-referential article]], which redirects to it. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 22:49, Apr 6, 2004 (UTC) * Pretty clever though - it's just turned itself into a performance piece. Could we keep it on the jokes page? --[[User:Pteron|Pteron]] 00:23, 7 Apr 2004 (UTC) *I like it. The article on offensive reserved words in computer languages rates up there, too! [[User:Kd4ttc|Kd4ttc]] 03:08, 7 Apr 2004 (UTC) *[[Wikipedia|BJAODN]]. [[User:Fennec|Fennec]] 04:38, 7 Apr 2004 (UTC) **Delete. But agree, BJAODN. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 17:12, 14 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Delete. Not funny, either. [[User:Cribcage|Cribcage]] 04:51, 7 Apr 2004 (UTC) * I vote to delete, but not without some reservations. I admit I got a chuckle out of the last line! [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 23:31, 9 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Delete. [[User:Jacob1207|Jacob1207]] 22:49, 10 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Keep. Pointless article. [[User:JRR Trollkien|JRR Trollkien]] 22:38, 14 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Delete. Did you notice the last line's hyperlink URL? "HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME, etc.."
